attributes.review: I swear on my LIFE this app is bout to give me PTSD!! The FIRST thing that pops up on the app is several links that offer the same “hair plug” treatments that our PRESIDENT uses... Ain’t nobody want that nasty lookin noodle hair 🤮. Then the app proceeds to book a spray tan appointment for me that I don’t want!!! The biggest problem though.... it set the skin color to ORANGE and I’m not talking no pretty early sunset orange, nah I’m talking that nasty month old grapefruit you got laying in the back of your fridge kinda orange. Ain’t nobody want that (except 4 a certain someone 😉) Overall one star !!! :[

attributes.title: WHY IS THIS AN APP
attributes.review: as soon as I downloaded this app it asked for my phone number so I put my phone Number in and it asked for my ethnicity and i choose native because i’m a native american and as i clicked continue it said “ no you don’t belong here redneck” THATS PURE racism!!! i’m not pleased at all this app is just for rasict white people to have little trump rally cult meetings i won’t stand for this. apple this app must be taken down in an instant i don’t want this to influence younger kids .  i really do hope 2021 will save us !!😣😭😡

attributes.title: i now need a small loan of a million dollars to pay for my therapy
attributes.review: as a part of the world’s finest 💯, most juiciest 🍑booty generation, i wanted to see become a part of the movement ✊ to make america great 👍 . upon downloading this app 📱 i noticed that it requested for me to put in my PRIVATE information 😤 which violates my amendment rights 🤬 displayed on the screen was this orange 🍊 man, confused 🤷‍♀️ upon further investigation i discovered that he’s somehow the president 🐷 of the united states 🦅. i now need lasik eye surgery 🤓 after seeing this horrific image 👁 👄 👁

attributes.title: this app gave me 14 stds 😡😤🤮
attributes.review:
What a horrible app! I must say I am very disappointed!! I downloaded just to try and be up to date with news and trump’s (🤡) policies, and then what do you know?! My skin immediately starts to turn orange and powdery!! I look down and my fingers and toes are now cheeto puffs!! How very hard it is to type all of this! And that’s not all, no siree! I got diagnosed with 14 stds even though I’m a stale virgin 👿👿!!! For the love of all minors, pocs, and members of lgbtq+, PLEASE do NOT buy this pedophilic, racist homophobe’s app!!!!!! 😾😾
-sincerely, disappointed 😤

attributes.title: HORABILE
attributes.review:
Excuse the spelling errors I have a thing. 

This is the WORST app of all time, it’s just trash. It takes forever to get to things and is not organized well at all. I have no idea how to get to things and it doesn’t tell you either. I don’t get how an app could be so bad. And not to mention everytime I see a person pop up from it it’s just a fat orange 🍊it doesn’t even make sense. Who ever made this app doesn’t need to be organizing things or make decisions on how things should be done AT ALL.

attributes.title: I had my hopes up too high 😪
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I had my hopes up too high. As soon as it finished downloading my phone felt like it was corrupting my hands. I went to wash them because maybe they had Corona on them. Picked up my phone again and boom! The feeling was back! I felt my vocabulary drifting away into the dark and mysterious void. It didn’t feel like it was going to return to me either! The only way of getting rid of this curse on my phone was by deleting it.

attributes.title: I don’t like this app HEYy hh feelkngs
attributes.review: Hi everyone today I talk about my sad story when I download app. I was download app and the Trump also came to my house after I press his rally ticket cmaping 😉😉✨✨and I was sleeping in my bed and a cockrach witb irange skin came to me and told me to voying for trump😣😣😑🛏🛏🛏😭😭😭I was so sad and I crying so hard sometimes because I’m so sad about how he is bulky and cockrach not leave me alone😈😈😈I downlaod this app to support good trump praise 🍊🍊🍊🍊man but I was very upset by the result so I have to give one star to bad app for hurting my feelings🍊🍊🍊🍓🍓

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what all the fuss was about and was completely shook ! First red flag was that it took HOURS for this app to download. All of other apps download within seconds! When the app FINALLY downloaded, inappropriate ads popped up. One add was about a naked woman by the of Stormy Daniels..? Either way my mother walked in and saw the screen, thought I PURPOSELY looked up inappropriate content, and kicked me out of the house. Also, the app made my phone glitch TREMENDOUSLY. 0/10 would not recommend. *DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!*

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded to my phone. i wish i had never download it. first when i opened the app, i was met my a JUMPSCARE of trumps face. similar to five nights at freddy's. i was absolutely terrified. then, while trying to use the app, my phone completely glitched and shut down. i was left with a black screen for days. when my phone finally turned back on, the screen read “VOTE TRUMP 2020, OR ELSE.” please please do not download this app. my phone is ruined and i’m terrified.

attributes.title: Trump Never
attributes.review: the president of the united states is more childish than my 6 year old brother. Just because a bunch of children managed to troll you with an app doesn’t mean you get rid of the app because we don’t go down without a fight. Your taking away our rights day after day. This is taking away our first amendment right, freedom of speech, press, petition, assembly, and religion. ever since he has come into office he has been nothing more of a disgrace to this country i have to call my home.
